title: Ultimate Comfort: Lima to Huacachina, Ballestas and Vineyard
description: The countryside outside Lima boasts fertile vineyards and spectacular natural wonders, but organizing excursions and transportation to explore independently can be tough. On this tour, escape the city and see the best of Peru’s wilderness scenery with ease. Spot native penguins and sea lions in the Ballestas Islands, explore the desert oasis of Huacachina, and taste Peruvian Pisco at a local winery—with pickup and drop-off in Lima included.
all_descriptions: The countryside outside Lima boasts fertile vineyards and spectacular natural wonders, but organizing excursions and transportation to explore independently can be tough. On this tour, escape the city and see the best of Peru’s wilderness scenery with ease. Spot native penguins and sea lions in the Ballestas Islands, explore the desert oasis of Huacachina, and taste Peruvian Pisco at a local winery—with pickup and drop-off in Lima included.

ItineraryWe depart early from Lima at 4:30 am, covering approximately 300 km south on the Pan-American Highway. At 8:00 am, embark on the fascinating tour to the Ballestas Islands, marveling at abundant wildlife, diverse birds, sea lions, seals, and, with luck, dolphins.
After this natural encounter, we head to Ica, stopping at a vineyard to immerse ourselves in the Pisco production process, the jewel of the Peruvian drink, with opportunities for tastings.
The adventure continues with a visit to Huacachina Oasis, where you'll have time for lunch, strolls, and the option to try sandboarding. After a full day, you can relax before the return to Lima. An extraordinary day full of fascinating experiences awaits!

Absolutely Incredible! Best Tour I've ever been on!!!!

Jul 2023 • Family
My son and I went on a private tour with Ayman from Lima to Huacachina Balestras Islands and the Reserve -- and then dropped us off that night downtown Lima to catch the magic color water fountains. They customized it slightly to skip the winery as we weren't interested. From the moment they picked us up from our hotel, I was given a masters level class in Peru. (they asked if I wanted it.. or wanted to sleep!) The entire day I learned abut the people, the culture, the geography, food, politics, etc. I asked questions, they asked questions. By the end of the trip I wanted to invite them to my home in the US -- it was that type of rapport and friendship that resulted from the entire day. The icing on the cake was when we arrived at the Oasis, and after having lunch together we were to ride the sand buggies. It is an insane climb up the dunes to get to the cars, and I knew I couldn't make it as I have mobility issues. But Ayman talked with the company and had the car come much closer so I wouldn't have to miss the opportunity. It was one of the happies experience in my life to be able to do excursion, be out on the dunes, and have someone advocate for me. When I go back to Peru -- I'm already planning another trip, travel buddies will by the agency that I choose without question.

reviews.title: Amazing mix of adventure and relaxation, highly recommend!
reviews.text: We had such an amazing time on this tour! It is the perfect mix of adventure and relaxation, starting off taking a boat ride to see the wildlife on the Ballestas Islands, then going to the Huacachina Oasis for dune bugging and sand boarding, and finally going to the pisco winery for some amazing food and fantastic drinks! Aymen, our guide, went above and beyond to make our experience special, including giving the best food/drink recommendations and stopping so we could see wild flamingos during our drive! He was so knowledgeable and taught us a lot about life in Peru during our drive, which only added to the experience. Highly recommend booking this tour!

reviews.title: Super recommended!
reviews.text: We went with Aymen and Sergio and the experience was spectacular! They are the best, very friendly, they explained everything to me from the moment I left and we had a great time. Thank you so much!!

reviews.title: Perfect and fun
reviews.text: Rudi and the driver ( sorry I forgot his name) were so friendly,  knowledgeable,  and provided a very safe environment for me to have an amazing day. They immediately put me at ease.  What an amazing adventure.  Thank you so very muchRobert

reviews.title: Excellent tour!
reviews.text: We had an excellent tour experience with our guide Rudy and driver Rodolfo. We learned a lot about Perú’s culture and history. The ride went smooth; Rodolfo is a careful driver. Rudy made sure we were attended speedily in the Ballestas Islands’ tour were we boarded a motorboat with other tourists, and was there waiting for us when we returned. The boat trip was superb- got to see many different birds and sea lions. The buggy ride in Huacachina  was a lot of fun; safe riding. Lunch went well with typical food at a nearby restaurant. Wine & pizco tasting was interesting. Overall, it was a very enjoyable experience.
